name: Loan Quest
description:
Casual 2D Hack & Slash Game for Android: Roam endless dungeons and find treasures to pay back your debt to the dragon!

    * Face randomized enemies!

    * Gain gold to buy new party members!

    * Choose your own buff cards!

*********************************************

Being in debt in real life is not enough for you? You want to experience the same agonizing stress and worry in a game too? Then play Loan Quest, where you'll be in debt to a fire breathing dragon! 

Instead of trying to get money from doing various jobs and gigs like in real life, you will be roaming enemy-infested dungeons instead. Paying back your debt has never been this fun and relaxing before. Not to mention that the further you go, the more treasure you're going to get!

When you have accumulated enough gold, you can spend them on all sorts of nice things, like upgrades or a whole new character altogether! Sure, you're in a debt and the dragon might eat you if you don't pay them back, but look at all the shiny new things you can buy! 

So, grab your trusty pan and pick up party members from your local tavern, as this will be the adventure of a lifetime!  

*********************************************

Loan Quest is a game project for school. It will not receive any updates or bug fixes after release. Consider it just a fun way to pass time :).
